3: Vera dodges Gabriel's aerial charge, and slashes at Gabriel's calf with her blade as he zips past her.
But Gabriel makes a turn in the air in time, dodging Vera's attack and putting distance between them.
Power, reaction speed, ductility.
Subpar.
Hah. Thanks for the bad review.
Noctis!
Coming!
A barrage of air grenades and armor-piercing rounds shower Gabriel continuously, forcing him to retreat before he could attack Vera.
Pathetic.
Got it.
Another explosion follows, and the building above Gabriel's head collapses, interrupting Gabriel's heavy blow.
And this is why, big fellas like you are just all muscle... and nothing else.
Aaand, my work here is done.
...You do not seek my death.
Hah, of course! Wringing off your stupid face would take a war the scale of Kowloong. That's not what I can do with my authority.
I'm just after the 'Ascension-Network' on you.
Aaaalright and done! Asimov's tracker really is something, eh? We now have the full network model of our Gabby here!
As if to provoke Gabriel, Vera deliberately turns on the speaker to her communications device so that Gabriel can hear the excited Noctis.
Don't think we didn't catch what Shome's hiding.
But, it's no different taking it from you.
Vera arches her body and leaps high in place. Grenades and flashbangs fired by Noctis and No. 21 explode right under her feet.
Ta-ta, 'fool.'
You're not getting away!
Gabriel's wings on his back emit a strange glow, and he takes off into the air.
...This cannot be used for long, but, still enough to catch a mere fly.
Tch...
Going after the Vera jumping between buildings, Gabriel soars into the sky.
